metadata.dc:author: Marín García, J
Fernández Liesa, R
Ramírez Gasca, T
Pérez Obón, J
Calvo Alvarez, A
Ortiz García, A
metadata.dc:description: A case of laryngeal histoplasmosis is reported. This laryngeal mycosis was diagnosed by histological identification of intracellular hyphae of Histoplasma capsulatum. Laryngoscopy revealed edema, erythema and leukoplakia of the righ vocal cord. Itrakonazole treatment was successful. The relevant literature is reviewed.
metadata.dc:title: Histoplasmosis laríngea.
[Laryngeal histoplasmosis].
